name: This Is Game Dev
description:
A game created for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM # 1 by Hugo KIEFFER and Thomas LOURTIES

this game is composed of 3 mini games representing three development phases, the goal of the game is to have as many followers as possible to sell as many copies of the game as possible.

the first mini game represente the code/debug phase, red line represent bug, to resolve a bug you need to click on it and then press the keys displayed to solve it

the seconde mini game is rythm game representing the creation of sound

the third mini game represent the creation of visuals in this mini game you need to choose and place the corects parts on the exemple in the center
